response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value for us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we propose a price of $14,000 for you to consider. We understand its value to you is $12,000, but we hope this offer strikes a balance that meets both our needs. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 14000}
